```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#read dataset
pols_month <- read.csv("./data/pols-month.csv")
```

```{r}
pols_month_clean <- 
  pols_month%>%
  janitor::clean_names()%>%
  separate(col = mon , into = c('year','month','day'),sep = '-',convert = TRUE)%>%
  mutate(month = month.name[month])%>%
```
